content:
ICS 1C HW 2 for NAM PYO LIM -- Heading

About QQ Skeleton

Name:NAM PYO LIM E-mail: easu1594@ea.oac.uci.edu Major: ECONOMIC

Three neat Web finds:

  1. Games and Arts
  2. FBI's X-FILES
  3. EUROPEAN SPACE INFORMATION SYSTEM

Questions I can now answer
  • What is future market for internet?
  • How does banks help their customers thought internet system?
  • Who are the member of Start Track?
  • How to communicate with other web usuer?
  • What is URL and how to use it?

  1. What is future market for internet?

    As we all know that world is changing rapidly and so does high technology. The world is demanding new information daily so they won't get behind from their competitor. The fastest way to get new information is use WEB WORLD BUSINESS. Therefor, many companies in the world joint inter net system and it seem more and more companies are joing the internet system. In the near future, all the world will connect with INTERNET INFORMATION SYSTEMSand the demand of internet system will increase rapidly. Return to list of questions.

  2. How does banks help their customers thought internet system?

    The many banks will be helpping their customer by internet system. In the near future, customer do not have to go to the bank to make payment or stand on line for long time. Customer could make their payment by their personal computer's by clickExpress Bankingfrom monitor. You will do all the banking at your home, even small business transition. The bank's internet will be provide all the help that you need throughBanking System!Now you do not have to stand on the line anymore.Return to list of questions.

  3. Who are the member of the Start Trackat?

    The Star Trek: The Next Generation, was quite successful TV series. When you ask, who are the members of Start Track, could anybody in the series. The members could be human or alien species. If you want to know human members of Start Trek then clickHuman Personal and if you want to know all the alien speciesthen clickAlien PersonalIf you clickStart Trek: The Next GEnerationwill show you the picture of The USS Enterprise and also give you general information about Star Trek.Return to list of questions.

  4. How to communicate with other web usuer?

    There are ways to communicate with other person or people through the computer. First,when we want to talk to individual then we will use Electronic Mail which we call Email. Email is sending message(s) to another user. Second, when you want to talk to group of people you may use Usenet System Usenet allow users across the internet to communicate with each other. There are many other network system allow you to talk to other groups such as Collaborative Networked Communication and ICB.Return to list of questions.

  5. What is URL and how to use it?

    What is URL? it is so simple to answer. URL is an Uniform Resource Locators which consists of a string of characters that uniquely identifies a resource on the internet and it also point to queries. There are many different URLs such as File URLs, Gopher URLs, HTTP URLs and many other URLs are possible. If you do not know how to use URLs then click A Beginner's Guide to URLs It will guide to URLs! Return to list of questions.

Submitted January 30, 1995 for ICS 1C
